member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST
member.summary: The WCM_CONNECTION_COST enumerated type determines the connection cost type and flags.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Connection cost information is not available.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_UNRESTRICTED
member.summary: The connection is unlimited and has unrestricted usage constraints.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_FIXED
member.summary: Usage counts toward a fixed allotment of data which the user has already paid for (or agreed to pay for).

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_VARIABLE
member.summary: The connection cost is on a per-byte basis.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_OVERDATALIMIT
member.summary: The connection has exceeded its data limit.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_CONGESTED
member.summary: The connection is throttled due to high traffic.

summary.para: The connection is outside of the home network.
summary.div: Note The WCM_CONNECTION_COST_ROAMING value comes directly from the connection source. Attempts to set it directly will fail.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_APPROACHINGDATALIMIT
member.summary: The connection is approaching its data limit.
